description: Cel mai popular difuzor inteligent al nostru cu Alexa. Designul elegant și compact oferă voci clare și un bas echilibrat pentru un sunet complet.
Completely redesigned around the next-generation M2 chip. The incredibly thin design and longer battery life make it the perfect everyday laptop.
Noise cancelling headphones with a powerful audio experience. Comfortable for all-day listening with 24 hours of battery life.
An innovative coffee and espresso maker that brews multiple single-serve cup sizes with a single touch of a button.
Thinner and lighter than ever before, with a glare-free display that reads like real paper, even in bright sunlight.
A vibrant 7-inch OLED screen and a wide adjustable stand for a more immersive gaming experience.
